questions.questionTitle: Where is the conversation most likely taking place?
How long will express delivery take?
What does the woman say about her order?
anwers: It needs to be delivered tomorrow.

script:
� Yes, I have a bulk order I need to ship to India. How fast will it get there if I send it express?
� Express will deliver within four days. That costs $2 a pound. If you need it there faster, you could send it overnight. That will guarantee it arrives by tomorrow, but it costs $3.50 per pound.
� I see. It isn't extremely urgent. Are there any cheaper options?
� Regular delivery is $1 a pound. It will get there in 7 to 10 days.
